metadata.synopsis: Minsc remembers how he tried to blow the Waterdeep conch

3.speaker: Minsc
3.text: Umberlee - her clerics possess a nasty streak as wide as her oceans.

1.speaker: Gale
1.text: So their reputation suggests - especially among the good folk of Waterdeep. I'm curious to learn how you fell foul of them...
1.context: NodeContext: Wasn't expecting Minsc to be familiar with a cult most associated with Waterdeep

0.speaker: Minsc
0.text: 'Blasphemy', said the temple priestess. But Minsc says: do not give horns to your statues if you do not wish the visitors to try and make them toot.
0.context: NodeContext: Sulky child. Maintains to this day he was not wrong to clamber onto Umberlee's statue and toot her conch shell.

2.speaker: Gale
2.text: Yes, that would probably do it.
2.context: NodeContext: Stumped - this is a truly stupid/inane reason to have angered the clerics of Umberlee
